summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Solar CRM multi-tenant application. All 32 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified all CRUD operations on Accounts, LPs, Forms, Leads, Commandes, and Users pages. All modals open/close correctly, stats are displayed, CRM switch works, and activity log shows events.
critical_code_review_comments: All CRUD operations work correctly on all pages (Accounts, LPs, Forms, Leads, Commandes, Users)
Forms page displays stats correctly: Démarrés (started), Leads (count), Conv. (conversion %)
Brief modal shows LP and Form scripts with 'Copier Script LP' and 'Copier Script Form' buttons
Relancer button works on failed/no_crm leads - 5 buttons found on Sans CRM tab
CRM switch (MDL/ZR7) works correctly - data filters by selected CRM
Activity log shows login events and user actions
User creation with custom permissions works correctly
All API endpoints require authentication (401 returned without token)
seed_data_creation: Test account and test user created and cleaned up during tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working: 1) Accounts page - create/edit/delete modals work, 2) LPs page - create/edit/delete/duplicate/brief modals work, Brief shows copy script buttons, 3) Forms page - shows stats (Démarrés, Leads, Conv.), product filter tabs (Tous/PV/PAC/ITE), 4) Leads page - filter tabs (Tous/Envoyés/Échoués/Sans CRM/En queue), Relancer buttons work, 5) Commandes page - create/delete work, 6) Users page - create with permissions, activity log tab shows events, 7) CRM switch (MDL/ZR7) filters data correctly

features_tested.details: Create modal opens, edit buttons visible, delete buttons visible, CRM filter works
Create modal opens, Brief modal shows scripts, copy buttons work, duplicate/edit/delete buttons visible
Démarrés, Leads, Conv. columns displayed, product type badges (PV/PAC/ITE) shown
5 Relancer buttons found on Sans CRM tab, clicking works
Create modal opens, delete buttons visible, CRM filter works
Create user modal shows permissions section, custom permissions work
Journal d'activité tab shows login events and user actions
Dropdown opens, ZR7 Digital selectable, data filters by CRM
Brief modal shows 'Copier Script LP' and 'Copier Script Form' buttons, copy works

external_apis_note: ZR7 and MDL are REAL external CRM APIs - not mocked. Lead submission sends data to these external APIs.
